description:
Add trunk space to your bike. Use this rack-mounted bag to supplement your panniers on extended tours or on its own for riding around town.

  • Main fabric is high-tenacity polyester with a water-resistant PU coating
  • Stiffened with plastic board so it keeps its shape
  • 2 hook-and-loop webbing straps attach the bag securely to your rack
  • Main compartment has mesh compartments to keep you organized
  • 2 flat exterior pockets give you ready access to quick-need items
  • Reflective end panel increases visibility
name: MEC World Tour Rack Trunk
